meanings.sent1: The scientist discovered an ichnite of a dinosaur in the rock.
meanings.sent2: Hikers found ichnites of ancient creatures along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The ichnite in the museum looked like a prehistoric dance step.
meanings.sent4: The ichnite in the sand was a ghostly imprint of the past.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the ichnite, imagining the dinosaur that left it.

meanings.definition: A trace or mark left by an animal.
meanings.sent1: The detective followed the ichnite of the missing cat to the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The ichnite of the rabbit led the fox straight to its burrow.
meanings.sent3: The ichnite on the cake gave away who took a bite before the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter left an ichnite of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The ichnite of the car's tire marked the beginning of the race.
